attributes.action: Ask the skilled UK workforce whether their income and job prospects have suffered as a consequence of opening the UK job market to migrant workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition if you have suffered and/or been affected! THIS PETITION IS NOT SIMILAR OR OVERLAPS IT IS SOLELY RELATED TO THE IMPACT UPON SKILLED WORKERS AS OPPOSED TO THE UNSKILLED.  BIG DIFFERENCE I WOULD SAY.
